snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [189] Shinobi III:  Return of the Ninja Master
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by:  TheGuyAleXD

This is my favorite shinobi game.
The game is played on expert mode.
There are 7 rounds.
Round 1: Zeed's Resurrection
Round 2: Secret Entry
Round 3: Body Weapon
Round 4: Destruction
Round 5: Electric Demon
Round 6: Traps
Round 7: The Final Confrontation
Overall, its a very hard and fun game!
Here is my youtube channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/TheGuyAleXD
Here is the website with the greatest longplays ever!
http://www.longplays.org/ -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
